FactionDef.label: Civil Ghoul Ghosttown
FactionDef.description: The Civil Mutant Settlement is a faction of survivors and settlers who have banded together to rebuild society in the aftermath of a devastating conflict. They are known for their resourcefulness, resilience, and commitment to community values. The CCS emphasizes cooperation and mutual aid among its members, striving to create a safe and prosperous environment despite the challenges they face in the post-apocalyptic world.

FactionDef.label: Rough Super Mutant Stronghold
FactionDef.description: The Rough Mutant Settlement is a loose collection of survivors hardened by the wasteland’s brutality. They value grit over grace, and survival over civility. Life here is harsh — trade is bartered through intimidation, disputes are settled with fists or gunfire, and law depends on who’s standing last. Despite their rough edges, they’ve carved out a functioning, if volatile, society where toughness earns respect and weakness finds no quarter.

FactionDef.label: Raider Mutant Army
FactionDef.description: The Mutant Raider Army thrives on chaos and plunder. Forged in the ashes of civilization, they scavenge, raid, and rule through fear. Their members are scarred, loud, and proud of their savagery, painting their armor with the symbols of past kills. They move in convoys of patched-together vehicles, hitting trade routes and settlements for supplies, slaves, or sport. To them, the wasteland isn’t a tragedy — it’s freedom without rules.
